summary: Created comprehensive architecture documentation for Gemini consultation. Built three key files: ARCHITECTURE_ANALYSIS_FOR_GEMINI.md (complete project structure analysis), GEMINI_ARCHITECTURE_CONSULTATION.md (detailed questions for architecture improvement), and PROMPT_FOR_GEMINI.md (final prompt for Gemini). The documentation covers current architecture (Laravel 12 Modular Monolith with DDD), identifies 15 key issues, and asks 12 critical questions about Domain structure, Service layer, Action classes, Event-driven architecture, API design, caching, testing, frontend architecture, performance, security, monitoring, and scalability. Goal is to elevate architecture to world-class standards.
